mapper.select: SELECT reply_table.id, reply_table.article_id AS articleId, reply_table.account_id AS accountId, account_table.nickname, reply_table.content, reply_table.regdate, reply_table.modify_date AS modifyDate, reply_table.enabled FROM reply_table JOIN account_table ON reply_table.account_id = account_table.id WHERE reply_table.article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_table VALUES( reply_seq.nextval, #{articleId}, #{accountId}, #{content}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{enabled} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reply_table SET content = #{content}, modify_date = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id} AND article_id = #{articleId} AND account_id = #{accountId} AND enabled = 1
UPDATE reply_table SET enabled = #{enabled} WHERE id = #{id} AND article_id = #{articleId} AND account_id = #{accountId} AND enabled = 1
